text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well.  How are you?
I'm doing pretty good. I'm not ready for this weekend to be over though. :(
I work on the weekend so it doesn't matter to me!
Ahh. I'm sorry. I was on call all weekend, but I never got called in.
Well that's good.  Glad you got to enjoy the holiday weekend.
I'm moved most of the weekend and tried to dodge the rain.
Ah, we didn't have any rain...just lots of heat.
There's a tropical storm coming through here so we're about to get a lot of rain.
Oh no...hope you are in a safe area.
I think I'll be ok. It's kind of a part of life here on the Gulf.
Yeah we get storms, but we are never really in the worst path.
Yeah we usually don't but every once in awhile we'll get one.
I'm just getting ready for back to school here.
Fun Fun. I guess I should get into what this chat is supposed to be about. Have you heard of the charity Save The Children?
Yes I have.  Do you donate to them?
I do donate to them and I plan on donating half of my payment today to them.
Oh great.  Maybe I will consider it.  I guess I'm always just trying to save for my own family.
That's understandable. I just bought a house so I'm having to save every bit I can. Any bit helps either way.
Congrats on the house!  It's always so much work!
